casebody.data:
Michael C. WARD, petitioner,
v.
Cathleen STODDARD, Warden, et al. No. 13-10370. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Michigan dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
